DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate whether regular consumption phytate dampens negative effect nonheme iron absorption .
DOC.brief_title: Regular Consumption High Phytate Reduces Inhibitory Effect Phytate Iron Absorption
DOC.detailed_description: Phytate one main inhibitor nonheme iron absorption . High phytate consumption concern develop country high prevalence iron zinc deficiency country . In study , investigated effect habitual consumption high phytate diet inhibitory effect phytate nonheme iron absorption . Thirty-two non-anemic female subject ferritin ≤ 30µg/L randomize two group , match ferritin concentration . Each group consume either high low phytate food provide 8 wk . Iron bioavailability high phytate test meal measure use area curve ( AUC ) serum iron baseline intervention .
DOC.criteria: Marginal iron status ( Serum ferritin < 30ug/L ) BMI range 18.524.9kg/m2 Willing modify diet increase decrease phytate intake Willing give multiple blood sample begin end study Pregnant Lactating Smoker Anemic ( hemoglobin < 120 g/L ) Has gastrointestinal disease/condition affect absorption
